title: DateTimeFromWeek (Function)
text:
FUNCTION DateTimeFromWeek : ULINT
Combines the ISO week date parts to a timestamp
uiYear
:=
2009
uiWeek
:=1
eWeekday:=WEEKDAY.MONDAY
=>
29.12.2008
uiYear
:=
2009
uiWeek
:=53
eWeekday:=WEEKDAY.SUNDAY
=>
03.01.2010
See:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

rows.Name: DateTimeFromWeek
rows.Comment: date and time in milliseconds since 1.1.1970 00:00:00.000
